snippet: As he considers a potential mayoral run in the wake of an online sex scandal, former Congressman Anthony D. Weiner has won a vote of confidence from a politician who can identify with his predicament: Eliot Spitzer.
abstract: As he considers a potential mayoral run in the wake of an online sex scandal, former Congressman Anthony D. Weiner has won a vote of confidence from a politician who can identify with his predicament: Eliot Spitzer.

headline.main: No Stranger to Scandal, Spitzer Says Weiner 'Can Come Back'
